de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.im.route

Interface ImMessageRouteComponent<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the recipient type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImMessageRouteBase, ImMessageRouteType, ImMessageRouteVendor

    interface ImMessageRouteComponent<T>
    Generic route element composite to compose a route table with routing elements. Collects recipients with their message type interests.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long countChildren()
      Returns the children count of this route element.
      List<T> findRecipients(Long vendorId, Long messageType)
      Finds a set of recipients for a message type described by the given vendor ID and message type ID.
      void subscribe(T recipient, de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.SupportedMessageType types)
      Adds a recipient to the route table using the given set of supported message types.
      void unsubscribe(T recipient)
      Removes a recipient from the route table using the given set of supported message types.

    • Method Detail

      • findRecipients

        List<T> findRecipients(Long vendorId,
                     Long messageType)
        Finds a set of recipients for a message type described by the given vendor ID and message type ID.
        Parameters:
        vendorId - the message type vendor ID
        messageType - the message type ID
        Returns:
        a set of recipients

      • subscribe

        void subscribe(T recipient,
             de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.report.SupportedMessageType types)
        Adds a recipient to the route table using the given set of supported message types. Subscribe does not properly update message types of existing recipient. Use remove and a new subscribe to update a set of supported message types for an existing recipient.
        Parameters:
        recipient - the recipient
        types - the set of supported messages types

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe(T recipient)
        Removes a recipient from the route table using the given set of supported message types.
        Parameters:
        recipient - the recipient

      • countChildren

        long countChildren()
        Returns the children count of this route element.
        Returns:
        the children count
